description:
The fleece light line has long proven to be super comfortable on the skin and so lightweight that it is
Barely noticeable. But our fleece light companions are ideal even in icy temperatures! Thanks to
Its fine tasmanian merino wool, high breathability and stretchability, this soft underwear
Stands for unparalleled comfort and an incomparable body-climate. The waffle structure on the inside
Ensures good moisture wicking and thus feels warm and dry on the skin – even in very low temperatures
Or on demanding ascents.
name: Ortovox Fleece Light Short Pants - Mens
